ai-tha-ap505:0.3_0: As he was about the fruit of the senior monks,
ai-tha-ap505:1.4_0: the world’s Elder, and the world does not clever.
ai-tha-ap505:2.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap505:2.3_0: Hearing the music of a five-free,
ai-tha-ap505:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap505:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap505:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap505:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap505:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsī.
ai-tha-ap505:8.1_0: third fruit of the senior monks.
